mdRecord.dcterms:description: Kirche am Steinhof, also called the Church of St. Leopold, is the Roman Catholic oratory of the Steinhof Psychiatric Hospital in Vienna, Austria. The building designed by Otto Wagner is considered one of the most important Art Nouveau churches in the world. ... mosaics and stained glass by Koloman Moser, and sculptural angels by Othmar Schimkowitz (1864â€“1947). The great majority of the other smaller details are the work of Otto Wagner himself. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kirche_am_Steinhof [work]
